statements: UPDATE ProvisioningTemplates SET infrastructure_type = 'AWS', provision_script = 'script.sh' WHERE template_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ProvisioningTemplates SET resource_name = 'EC2 Instance', container_image = 'image123' WHERE template_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE ProvisioningTemplates SET resource_name = 'Web Server', provision_script = 'bash deploy_web_server.sh', container_image = 'nginx:latest' WHERE template_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed';
UPDATE ProvisioningTemplates SET container_image = 'postgres:latest', infrastructure_type = 'Database', resource_name = 'Database Server' WHERE template_id = 'a5d7f827-fbcd-4c7a-92a6-7f9f86674ba0';
UPDATE virtual_machines SET vm_name = 'VM 1', vm_template = 'Template 1' WHERE vm_id = 1;
UPDATE containers SET container_image = 'Image 2', container_name = 'Container 2' WHERE container_id = 2;
UPDATE virtual_machines SET vm_name = 'vm1_updated', vm_template = 'new_template' WHERE vm_id = 1;

UPDATE container_templates SET port = 8080, image_name = 'nginx:latest' WHERE template_id = 'a2e621d7-690a-4986-890d-0cedff043520';

UPDATE container_templates SET ports = '8080, 9090' WHERE template_id = 2;
UPDATE vm_templates SET ram_gb = 16, cpu_cores = 4 WHERE template_name = 'Ubuntu VM';
UPDATE container_templates SET image_name = 'nginx:v1.2', ports = '80,443', environment_variables = 'DEBUG=False' WHERE template_name = 'Nginx Container';
UPDATE virtual_machines SET cpu_count = 8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE containers SET status = 'Running', cpu_limit = 2 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE virtual_machines SET os = 'Linux', cpu_count = 4 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE containers SET status = 'Stopped', memory_limit = 4096 WHERE name = 'web_container';
